website_summaries.verdict: This attractive pie pan is great as bakeware and also a beautiful serving dish.
pros: Ceramic that can go in the oven
The glaze on this is very hard so that it doesn't scratch easily
Can be cleaned in the dishwasher
Nice depth at 2.5" so you can make a deep-dish pie or pizza
Nice angle on the sides of the pan
cons: It's on the expensive side for pie bakeware
May not cook as evenly as metal or glass pans, and it's breakable

customer_reviews.title: More than a pie pan.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to review. I mean, it is a pie plate, and if you put a pie in it and put it in a heated oven, it bakes. But that doesn't capture the essence. The weight of the pan and height and thickness of the sidewalls are just right. The angle of the sides, the radius of the join where the bottom and the sides meet... they are perfect and will not break even heavy dough. The glaze is lovely and free of flea bites or imperfections. Sometimes a thing transcends its label. The pleasure of making a pie in this makes it more than a mere pie plate. I'm glad to own and use it.
